name: Sterpa Dario
goal: Advising to small and business enterprices to develop business model and apply to european and national/regional funds for smes. Advising local authorities in member state to apply to european funds. Advising the local authorities about development of policies in the topics of employment, social inclustion, integration of migrants. Providing indipendent study and analysis about the same topics. Project/Programme management of project cofinanced by european funds such as ESIF, H2020,SMEInstrument etc. Supporting consultant companies in apply to technical assistance public procurement in IPA programs, Europe AID and Regional development policies.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Culture, Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, External Relations, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Advising local authorities in member state to apply to european funds. Advising the local authorities about development of policies in the topics of employment, social inclustion, integration of migrants.Supporting consultant companies in apply to technical assistance public procurement in IPA programs, Europe AID and Regional development policies.
